title: Special information about lodgings
context: Tell a tenant where to park their car or throw away trash.

content.bestLine: Please park in the designated lot and dispose of trash in the bins provided.

neutral.text: Park in the lot to your left.
Trash cans are located near the elevator.
Parking is available on a first-come basis.
Please throw away your trash before checking out.
The parking lot is monitored by security cameras.
Recycling bins are available in the lobby.
Please do not leave trash in the hallways.
Parking fees are waived for hotel guests.

formal.text: Guest parking is available in the designated lot.
Please dispose of trash in the receptacles provided.
Parking and trash facilities are available for your convenience.
We kindly request that you refrain from littering.
Parking and trash information is available at the front desk.
Please follow the posted signs for parking and trash disposal.

patterns.meaning: Directing someone to park or dispose of trash
Providing information about parking or trash facilities

dialogs.description: Hotel staff providing parking and trash information to a guest

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: Hello, welcome to our hotel. Please park in the designated lot and dispose of trash in the bins provided.

lines.speaker: Guest
lines.text: Thank you, where are the trash cans located?

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: The trash cans are located near the elevator on each floor.

dialogs.description: Hotel staff reminding a guest about parking and trash policies

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: Reminder, parking is available on a first-come basis and please do not leave trash in the hallways.

lines.speaker: Guest
lines.text: Okay, got it. What about recycling?

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: Recycling bins are available in the lobby.
